<title level="1" right="Rules">[Attack Potency](/Rules.aspx?ID=1359)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 196</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Starting at 2nd level, you gain a +1 potency bonus to attack rolls with all weapons and unarmed attacks. This increases to +2 at 10th level, and +3 at 16th level.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
